title: Ticket #4624: SelfMonitorAge is not documented
description:
In GlideinWMS we are using SelfMonitorAge in the startd daemon shutdown expression: 
DS_IDLE_NJ_AC82 = ((SelfMonitorAge =!= UNDEFINED) && \
	                   (JobStarts == 0) && \
	                   (SelfMonitorAge > GLIDEIN_Max_Idle))

This was suggested in ticket #3481 but SelfMonitorAge is not documented (at least not in the index). Could you add it to the documentation and the index?

Thanks, Marco
remarks:
2015-Jan-05 14:10:20 by smoler:
So, SelfMonitorAge is not the correct name for this attribute, and that is why you can't find documentation for it. Please see MonitorSelfAge.
creator: marco
